org.jb2011.lnf.beautyeye.ch17_split
类 SplitPaneDividerBorder

java.lang.Object
  org.jb2011.lnf.beautyeye.ch17_split.SplitPaneDividerBorder
所有已实现的接口：
javax.swing.border.Border, javax.swing.plaf.UIResource
public class SplitPaneDividerBorder
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.border.Border, javax.swing.plaf.UIResource

分隔条的border实现类.

Draws the border around the divider in a splitpane. To get the appropriate effect, this needs to be used with a SplitPaneBorder.

作者：
Jack Jiang(jb2011@163.com)
